description: The Netherlands, Spain and Turkey have all said some Chinese-made equipment is substandard.
title: Coronavirus: Countries reject Chinese-made equipment
title_page: Coronavirus: Countries reject Chinese-made equipment - BBC News
maintext: Italy remains the worst affected country worldwide. More than 10,000 people have died from the virus there, and it has recorded nearly 100,000 infections. Only the US has more confirmed cases, although the death toll there is far lower.
